title: New Details on Hugh Hefner's Life in the Playboy Mansion
text: New Details on Hugh Hefner's Life in the Playboy Mansion Monday, 19 October 2015 (10 minutes ago) A Playboy model is opening up about Hugh Hefner‘s life in his mansion – Radar Beyonce brought her daughter to Janet Jackson‘s concert – US Weekly Britney Spears handled a wardrobe malfunction like a pro – Huffington Post Blac Chyna threw a major birthday party for her and Tyga‘s son – TMZ The first photos [...] Playboy Will Stop Publishing Nude Photos 00:42 With a sultry Marilyn Monroe on its cover, the adult magazine, Playboy, launched in 1953. The magazine, made famous for its nude photographs of aesthetically appealing models, says it will stop publishing the photographs of fully nude women so closely associated with it. According to chief...
